title: Cinema API

api_list.name: Get Movie Reviews By Id
api_list.description: This Endpoint returns a complete list of reviews associated to the ID. You can obtain the ID from the Get Movie By ID endpoint.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Movie ID. You can obtain the ID from the Get Movie By ID endpoint.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cinema-api.p.rapidapi.com/get_reviews/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cinema-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Movie Images By ID
api_list.description: This Endpoint returns a complete list of images associated to the ID. You can obtain the ID from the Get Movie By ID endpoint.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Movie ID. You can obtain the ID from the Get Movie By ID endpoint.

api_list.name: Get Movie ID By Title
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve the ID of the movies you are interested in. You can search your movie or your preferite actor.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cinema-api.p.rapidapi.com/get_ids/{title}/{category}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cinema-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Cast By ID
api_list.description: With this endpoint, you can retrieve the full cast's list (together with their images and their role in the movie).

required_parameters.name: ID
required_parameters.description: Movie ID. You can obtain the ID from the Get Movie By ID endpoint.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cinema-api.p.rapidapi.com/get_cast/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cinema-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
